title: Microsoft L61 offer
content:
Education: B. Tech Tier I
Years of Experience: 4
Prev Comp : 22LPA Fixed + 10 % Variable + 3L Bonus
Company: Microsoft
Title/Level: SDE II
Location: Hyderabad
Salary: 28LPA Fixed + upto 20% variable
Relocation/Signing Bonus: 4 L
Stock bonus: 65,000 USD
Total comp (Salary + Bonus + Stock): 45 for first year
Benefits: Standard MS Benefits
Other details:

Dont have any other competing offer so not able to negotiate. Your thoughts? Feels lowballed.
